selectTotalCount.SERVICE_NAME:
select count(*) as CNT
from it_pattern
where kind = ?
and pattern_group = ?
selectTotalCount.aop_point_method:
String rule = request.getFieldValue("rule_group");
String pattern = request.getFieldValue("pattern_group");
String kind = request.getFieldValue("kind");
String page = request.getFieldValue("page");
rule = rule == null || "".equals(rule) ? "FREE" : rule;
pattern = pattern == null || "".equals(pattern) ? "IT" : pattern;
kind = kind == null || "".equals(kind) ? "GENERAL" : kind;
page = page == null || "".equals(page) ? "0" : page;
request.setFieldValue("rule_group",rule);
request.setFieldValue("pattern_group",pattern);
request.setFieldValue("kind",kind);
request.setFieldValue("page",page);

patternList.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT *
FROM it_pattern
WHERE kind = ?
AND pattern_group = ?
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
LIMIT ? , 20
patternList.aop_point_method:
String rule = request.getFieldValue("rule_group");
String pattern = request.getFieldValue("pattern_group");
String kind = request.getFieldValue("kind");
String page = request.getFieldValue("page");
rule = rule == null || "".equals(rule) ? "FREE" : rule;
pattern = pattern == null || "".equals(pattern) ? "IT" : pattern;
kind = kind == null || "".equals(kind) ? "GENERAL" : kind;
page = page == null || "".equals(page) ? "0" : page;
request.setFieldValue("rule_group",rule);
request.setFieldValue("pattern_group",pattern);
request.setFieldValue("kind",kind);
request.setFieldValue("page",page);
